metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7053 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Irssi before 1.0.7 and 1.1.x before 1.1.1. There is a use-after-free when SASL messages are received in an unexpected order.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7053` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

irssi - 0.8.19-1ubuntu1.7
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

notes.Note: leosilva> from debian, vulnerable code was introduced in 0.8.18 trusty is not-affected.

criterions.comment: irssi package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.19-1ubuntu1.7').
